overview: "Holy Week, probably the most sacred time of the year, a time where Christâ€™s sufferings are retold- relieved. Kapampangans are among the ones that manifest their faith by re-enacting the suffering of Christ. However, in the midst of this Holiness, evil still works its way to the people. But in the end, forgiveness and salvation is offered by our redeemer - Jesus Christ."
title: The Redeemer
